heroInfo.introduction: Management   Professional, Business   Strategy   Specialist, Financial  Analyst, Data   Analytics   Enthusiast
heroInfo.description: Results-driven management professional with expertise in business strategy, marketing, and operations. Passionate about driving organizational growth through data-driven decision-making and leadership.

listOfAchievements.text: Google Cloud Professional DevOps Engineer Certification (2023): Gained expertise in cloud-based testing, CI/CD, and infrastructure automation.
Speaker at Selenium Conference (2024): Delivered a talk on integrating Selenium with AI for enhanced test automation in large-scale systems.

projects.headline1: Implemented AI-driven test case generation, improving test coverage by 40% and reducing undetected defects in production.
projects.headline2: Led a team of 8 automation engineers to develop a scalable testing framework for microservices architecture.
projects.designation: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET II)
projects.skills: Python, Cypress, Performance Testing, Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD

projects.headline1: Developed an automation testing suite using Selenium and Java, reducing regression testing time by 70%.
projects.headline2: Integrated test automation with CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, enabling faster and more reliable software releases.
projects.skills: Selenium, Java, TestNG, Jenkins, REST Assured, API Testing, Agile

qualifications.courseName: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
qualifications.headline1: Developed a robust test automation framework for a university project, reducing manual testing efforts by 60%.
qualifications.headline2: Conducted research on machine learning-driven test case generation and published a paper in a national conference.
